FILE: cm002305v11.0.txt
DYAD: USA - AUSTRIA
RIVALRY: RIV62
DISPUTE(S): MID2876 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20170806
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20170806

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID2876

TERRMID: MID2876 3 -- not territory
TERRMID-CER: MID2876 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: MID2876 American helicopter landed in Austria instead of West Germany by mistake (Gibler 2018). Coded not territory because Austria and US did not dispute territory between them.

TERRLINK: MID2876 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID2876 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: MID2876 Coded not third party link to territory because, although the US attempted to land in West Germany, the East/West German territorial issue is not driving or underlying this dispute. No other links to territorial issues exist in this dispute.

MARITMID: MID2876 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2876 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID2876 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2876 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2876 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2876 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID2876 3 -- not civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2876 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2876 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2876 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2876 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2876 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

RIVNOTES:
